synopsis: Lightning strikes the castle Dr. Azuma has his laboratory in and the electricity fries the circuits in one of his Androids brains, making it a self-aware android with an agenda.
With the Braiking's agenda in full swing, Casshan must rescue his parents from the androids clutches! After rescuing his dad, Casshan realizes why sunlight is so important.
Andro Force is destroying human lives on a town-by-town basis. In the midst of their destruction, Casshan saves a girl from his past named Lucy who is convinced that she knows who he is.

title.jp: Channel Anger Into the MF Gun

synopsis: Andro Force is on the hunt for Lucy and her father Dr. Kozuki, the scientist who has developed the MF Gun, which is capable of destroying androids in an instant.
